_meta.name: Empire Character Portrait
_meta.description: Template for generating consistent character portraits with style control

variables.REFERENCE_IMAGE: Path to reference image for consistency

inputs.text: {{POSITIVE_PROMPT}}, masterpiece, best quality, highres, detailed face, detailed eyes, anime illustration, visual novel style, clean lines, soft lighting

{{NEGATIVE_PROMPT}}, lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, text, error, missing fingers, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry, bad feet, multiple views, reference sheet
